metadata.title: CVE-2018-12035 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In YARA 3.7.1 and prior, parsing a specially crafted compiled rule file cancause an out of bounds write vulnerability in yr_execute_code inlibyara/exec.c.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
